## Description {#details}

Wrapper pass for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>.

This pass can be constructed from a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> object which it stores internally and is queried by passes.

Definition at line 3250 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/targettransforminfo-h">TargetTransformInfo.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### TargetTransformInfoWrapperPass() {#a1a5eed6801231fa436393e02c7066c71}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="TargetTransformInfoWrapperPass::TargetTransformInfoWrapperPass ()">
We must provide a default constructor for the pass but it should never be used.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> the constructor below or call one of the creation routines.
